verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Good Christian men, rejoice newline With heart, and soul, and voice; newline Give ye heed to what we say; newline Jesus Christ is born today. newline Ox and ass before Him bow, newline And He is in the manger now. newline Christ is born today! newline Christ is born today!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Good Christian men, rejoice newline With heart, and soul, and voice; newline Now ye hear of endless bliss; newline Joy! Joy! newline Jesus Christ was born for this! newline He hath opened heaven's door newline And man is blessed forevermore. newline Christ was born for this! newline Christ was born for this!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Good Christian men, rejoice newline With heart, and soul, and voice; newline Now ye need not fear the grave, newline Peace! Peace! newline Jesus Christ was born to save! newline Calls you one calls you all, newline To gain His everlasting hall. newline Christ was born to save! newline Christ was born to save!
